016package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity;
017
018import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
019import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
020import androidx.room.ColumnInfo;
021import androidx.room.Entity;
022import androidx.room.Index;
023import androidx.room.PrimaryKey;
024import java.time.Instant;
025
026/**
027 * Encapsulates the data elements maintained for a signed-in user in the app's Room/SQLite-based
028 * persistent data store.
029 */
030@SuppressWarnings("unused")
031@Entity(
032    tableName = "user",
033    indices = {
034        @Index(value = "oauth_key", unique = true),
035        @Index(value = "display_name", unique = true)
036    }
037)
038public class User {
039
040  @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true)
041  @ColumnInfo(name = "user_id")
042  private long id;
043
044  @ColumnInfo(name = "oauth_key")
045  @NonNull
046  private String oauthKey = "";
047
048  @ColumnInfo(name = "display_name", collate = ColumnInfo.NOCASE)
049  @NonNull
050  private String displayName = "";
051
052  // TODO Define additional fields as appropriate.
053
054  /**
055   * Returns the auto-generated unique identifier of this instance.
056   */
057  public long getId() {
058    return id;
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Sets the unique identifier of this instance.
063   *
064   * @param id
065   */
066  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
067  public void setId(long id) {
068    this.id = id;
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Returns the fixed OAuth2.0 identifier (aka <em>subject</em>) of this user.
073   */
074  @NonNull
075  public String getOauthKey() {
076    return oauthKey;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Sets the fixed OAuth2.0 identifier (aka <em>subject</em>) of this user.
081   *
082   * @param oauthKey
083   */
084  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
085  public void setOauthKey(@NonNull String oauthKey) {
086    this.oauthKey = oauthKey;
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Returns unique display name of this user.
091   */
092  @NonNull
093  public String getDisplayName() {
094    return displayName;
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Sets unique display name of this user.
099   *
100   * @param displayName
101   */
102  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
103  public void setDisplayName(@NonNull String displayName) {
104    this.displayName = displayName;
105  }
106
107  // TODO Define additional getters and setters. These must be defined for any additional fields
108  //  mapped to database columns.
109
110  /**
111   * Computes and returns the {@code int}-valued hash code of this instance. Currently, this
112   * computation is based only on the primary key value.
113   */
114  @Override
115  public int hashCode() {
116    return Long.hashCode(id);
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Compares this instance to {@code obj} for equality and returns a {@code boolean} result.
121   * Currently, this comparison is based only on the type of {@code obj}, and (if
122   * {@code obj instanceof User}) the primary key values of {@code this} and {@code (User) obj}: two
123   * instances of {@link User} are considered equal if and only if their {@code id} field values are
124   * equal and non-zero.
125   *
126   * @param obj Object to compared to {@code this}.
127   * @return {@code true} if {@code this} and {@code obj} should be considered equal; {@code false}
128   * otherwise.
129   */
130  @Override
131  public boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj) {
132    boolean matched;
133    if (obj == this) {
134      matched = true;
135    } else if (obj instanceof User) {
136      User other = (User) obj;
137      matched = (id != 0 && other.id != 0 && id == other.id);
138    } else {
139      matched = false;
140    }
141    return matched;
142  }
143
144}
